text: Janez Stanovnik (4 August 1922 â€“ 31 January 2020) was a Slovenian economist, politician, and Partisan. He was the last President of the Socialist Republic of Slovenia between 1988 and 1990. From 2003 to 2013, he was the president of the Slovenian Partisan Veterans' Association. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Ljubljana Category:Presidents of Slovenia Category:Yugoslavian economists
title: Janez Stanovnik
